# BioNixus Healthcare Market Research

> BioNixus is a specialist pharmaceutical market research company headquartered in London, UK (Company #14408704), serving healthcare and pharma clients across MENA (Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait) and Europe (UK, EU5).

## Core Services
- Quantitative Research: CATI, CAPI, online surveys with HCPs across MENA & Europe
- Qualitative Research: In-depth interviews, focus groups, advisory boards with physicians and KOLs
- Market Access Strategy: Pricing, reimbursement, HTA submissions for SFDA, DOH, MHRA/NICE, EMA
- Competitive Intelligence: Pharma pipeline monitoring, prescriber analytics, formulary tracking
- Clinical Trial Support: Site feasibility, patient recruitment, real-world evidence across GCC

## Markets
- Saudi Arabia: 50+ projects, SFDA expertise, Vision 2030 healthcare alignment
- UAE: 40+ projects, DOH/MOHAP regulatory knowledge, multilingual capabilities
- Kuwait: 20+ projects, MOH frameworks, public hospital network access
- United Kingdom: HQ in London, MHRA/NICE expertise, 50+ NHS trust coverage
- Europe (EU5): EMA/G-BA/HAS regulatory bodies, 15+ country partner network

## Therapy Areas
Oncology, Diabetes & Endocrinology, Respiratory & Immunology, Cardiology, Dermatology (Biologics), Vaccines & Infectious Disease

## Methodologies
ESOMAR-compliant, GDPR-compliant, CATI, CAPI, online surveys, IDIs, focus groups, KOL mapping, Delphi panels, claims data analysis
